info.description:
The Azure Management Groups API enables consolidation of multiple 
subscriptions/resources into an organizational hierarchy and centrally 
manage access control, policies, alerting and reporting for those resources.
info.title: Management Groups

tags.description:
A Management Group is a customer defined scope (grouping mechanism) that 
provides access control (authorization), policy management and reporting. 
Management Groups are organized in a strictly tree-based hierarchy.
tags.name: ManagementGroups

get.description: List management groups for the authenticated user.

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2017-08-31-preview.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description:
Page continuation token is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. 
If a previous response contains a nextLink element, the value of the nextLink element will include a token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls.
parameters.name: $skiptoken

schema.description: The result of listing management groups.

nextLink.description: The URL to the next page of results.

id.description: The ID of the management group. E.g. /providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/20000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000

name.description: The name of the management group. E.g. 20000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: The generic properties of a management group.

displayName.description: The friendly name of the management group.

tenantId.description: The AAD Tenant ID associated with the management group. E.g. 10000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. /providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

get.description: Get the details of the management group.

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2017-08-31-preview.
parameters.name: api-version

parameters.description: The $expand=children query string parameter allows clients to request inclusion of children in the response payload.
parameters.name: $expand

parameters.description: The $recurse=true query string parameter allows clients to request inclusion of entire hierarchy in the response payload.
parameters.name: $recurse

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

get.description: Lists all of the available management REST API operations.

parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2017-08-31-preview.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: Result listing  operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of management operations supported by the Microsoft.Management resource provider.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
